TopicTitle: How do you install TAC Life Support and Module Manager?

Articles.Content:
Just as the title says how do you install TAC Life Support and Module Manager? As in where do you put it in the save files?

Edited February 26, 2014 by spaceman1999
You copy both of them into the GameData folder. You don't need to do anything in the saves file.
This add-on question moved to the add-on questions sub-forum.
